text: NASA confirms the successful landing of the Artemis I mission on the Moon's surface.
Celebrity endorses miracle weight loss pill that works overnight, doctors warn against it.
UN releases report on climate change impacts highlighting urgent action needed.
Man claims he invented a device that generates free unlimited energy.
New study shows benefits of a balanced diet for reducing heart disease risk.
Some people mistakenly believe the Earth is flat despite overwhelming evidence.
Local government announces plan to increase green spaces and urban tree planting.
Fake news spreads that drinking bleach cures COVID-19, health officials strongly refute.
